item.title: Town Tree
item.description:
This track was created to be used for an RPG-style town or town hall music, with a calm fantasy-esque melody and steady tempo.

Featuring mostly bassoon, a fantasy melody is accompanied by a driving, yet soft, set of folk percussion.

Hope you enjoy!

item.title: Overworld Wilderness
item.description: Overworld Wilderness is a track used as overworld music for the XBox Live Arcade / Steam game Breath of Death VII. This track represents a cliche in older console-like RPG games of the 16-bit era and earlier, to provide the player an adventurous back tone to the exporation of new areas in overworld and area maps.
